body.name: WANWAYTECH 4G GPS Tracker for Vehicles, Car, Kids, Dogs, Motorcycle,10S Instant Updates, car GPS Tracker, Geo-Fence,Remote Anti Theft,Monthly Fee Required (6000mah Rechargeable Battery GPS Tracker)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 37 mins
features: [AFFORDABLE SUBSCRIPTION] SIM card included. Monthly fee of $17.99/month (as low as $10.83 for long-term prepaid plans, 10S instant location updates). You can use it worldwide with no contract, activation or cancellation fees. Activate service when you need it, with no hidden fees.

[REAL-TIME POSITIONING] WANWAY TECH is the earliest high-tech company engaged in GPS positioning industry, specializing in satellite positioning IoT location service industry. We use 4G LTE+ technology and cooperate with vodafone, which is satellite positioning and transmit signals faster. The positioning information is updated once in 10 seconds, real real-time positioning.

[ULTRA LONG-LIFE] GPS tracker has a built-in 6000mAh high-capacity battery that can last up to 15 days in smart energy-saving mode, ensuring long-lasting performance and uninterrupted service. In addition, the device also features an overspeed alarm, and geo-fence alarm and takedown alarm.

[MAGNET MOUNT] The GPS tracker base is magnetic and attaches to metal. And it has a light sensor that sends an alarm signal on your app when removed. It is a good warning for your vehicle as well as your property.The best way to track cars, Vehicles, trucks, kids, motorcycles, ATV, boats, drones, children, teens, spouses, pets, wallet, luggage, elderly, seniors, Alzheimer, Autistic, equipment, tools, employees, business assets, fleets and valuable belongings.

[7*24H SUPPORT] We provide 7*24H after-sales support customer service so that you can get help when you need it. For equipment failure, you can also contact Amazon after-sales customer service for replacement. If you have problems with installation and setup, you can also contact our after-sales staff.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why WanWayTech is a great choice 1, We produce & develop GPS trackers - we are not resellers.2, We develop our own Android & IOS APP,Friendly to use.3, You can get a new device for free if it got defectived within a year4, Straight from the app contact our team.5, Worldwide coverage .6, Unlimited distance infinite range real time tracking device7, Our android & iOS APPs shows panoramic Google street view.8, 8000mAh Rechargeable Battery,Usage up to 50 days9, Two tracking modes: Satellite for outdoors + base station indoors10,10S Instant Updates,collects data every second, analyzes, and sends update to the server every 10s

Our Advantage 4G Real-time Tracking&10S Instant Updates Our 4G LTE Device collects data every second, analyzes, and sends update to the server every 10s. 6000mAh Rechargeable Battery Long-lasting 6000mAh battery, usage can range from 20 days up to 30 days according to your preferred location update interval settingsMulti working modeNormal working mode (GPS keeps working)Smart power saving mode (GPS sleeps when device is static)Interval work modeOnce a day mode Global Unlimited Distance FULL Worldwide coverage & unlimited distance. International SIM card included. Use Wanway device when you travel abroad to safeguard your suitcase or track your family members in a foreign location. LTE 4G + added 3G & 2G, works everywhere with old or new networks for best coverage.

Many alerts & options Track anything that moves Track cars, Vehicles, trucks, kids, teen drivers, spouses, pets, wallet, luggage, elderly, seniors, Alzheimer, Autistic, equipment, tools, employees, business assets, motorcycles, ATV, fleets and valuable belongings. boats, drones Free installation With Strong Magnetic,The device is easy to install in some metal thing. Indoors & outdoors Tracker 2 redounded tracking modes works indoor and out door. GPS satellites for outdoors. When indoors & GPS signal is lost, Our device will Obtain location information of mobile terminal users through telecommunication, mobile operator's radio communication network

Multi Functional Track playback Check your vehicle's history track to help you find useful information. Geo-fence alarm Users can set a geofence range on a map with a circular polygon or customize the shape and it will sound an alarm when the device enters or leaves the preset range via APP or SMS Light Sensor & Disassemble Alarm Send alarm notification when someone remove the device.

Overspeed alarm When your speed is higher than the set speed, it will send an alarm to remind you to stay safe. Low Power Consumption When device is in low power, send message to tell you charge it in time. Fast Positioning Provide a timely positioning service after installing it.

The type of clients we got & our commitment to excellence Latest tool Peace - Safety - Security WanwayTech works for unlimited range & using state of the art apps compatible with iOS & Android smart phone, Google Maps, Alexa, Google assistant, Google Panoramic street view, iPhone & Android. Powerful Android and iPhone apps Enjoy the peace of mind and know where your things are at any moment. Get panoramic street view of real time or historical location of where the tracker is. Get full address real time or historical. Straight from the app contact our team via voice or chat. Access how-to videos and user manual. Our services Optional 24/7 roadside assistance. Lifetime supporter including lost or damaged device.We'd love to send you a new device if you receive the faulty device within 1 year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Customer service staff responded quickly and gave step-by-step instructions, and also patiently answered some minor questions, so I appreciate the support of customer service and technicians.The device is magnetic and can be directly attached to the car after installing a 4G sim card, which is more convenient than some other GPS devices that need to be installed, and has supporting software that can be seen on the phone.Just installed and started using it with the help of customer service, looking forward to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it, it gives me peace of mind that my car is parked there. I can see the location of the car on my phone.Long battery life too, the tracker works on my car for over 20 days, SO AMAZING! The app is great,the user interface is easy to navigate.The tracking path is accurate, and the playback is smooth.Irecommend this to my friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product portrays itself to be $8 a month but in all of their deals for the app subscription, none were less than $10. The product works well though and is accurate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good gps tracker, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Good gps tracker for me.Fast and easy install.Its APP is also very easy to operate, and the interface is simple and easy, can receive speeding alerts. And you can also see the positioning information when the car is stopped. is very good.Will purchase another for my next vehicles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I haven’t really put it through the paces but geofencing works well.
reviews.reviewText: I put this on a piece of farm equipment. Since it hasn’t left the property I can’t say with certainty how well it works but I can track it around the farm so I know it works. I will get an alert when I get close to the geo boundary. It’s very easy to hide on a piece of equipment and cost of monitoring is reasonable. If you have automobiles or expensive equipment I would definitely recommend getting this.
